name: wheat
description: Known gluten-containing or cross-contaminated ingredient. Avoid for celiac, gluten sensitivity, or acne triggers.
symptom_pattern: Scattered, rogue lesions on arms, legs, and trunk; longer-lasting than dairy-based acne.
